title: Update FO-06 info page
description:
Update the FO-06 info page with correct information.

File to modify:
- `app/fo-06/info/page.tsx`

Update the info page to describe FO-06:
- Title: FO-06
- Description: Streamlined onboarding with simplified investigation
- Key features:
  - No progress bar
  - Name input only (no welcome/familiarity/topic selection)
  - Fixed opening question
  - Question-only format (no separate reflective statement)
  - 2-5 investigation screens
  - Same fragment UI as FO-05

Reference: `app/fo-05/info/page.tsx`

⚠️ Do not close until /fo-06/info shows correct FO-06 description.
acceptance_criteria: Navigating to /fo-06/info shows FO-06 description mentioning 'streamlined' or 'simplified'
closed_reason: Updated info page with FO-06 streamlined flow description
